alert.note: Alert for Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 14 at 7:25PM MST until January 15 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. On Monday, northwest winds gusting to 25 to 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern Campbell County, Southern Campbell County, Western Crook County, the Weston County Plains and the Newcastle Area. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. Tonight and Monday, areas of blowing snow with minor drifting possible, especially in the areas that receive light snow overnight.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Warning means the combination of wind and cold temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. Even if you are outdoors for just a few minutes, cover all parts of your body, especially your head, face, and hands.

area.areaDesc: Newcastle; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston County Plains
